title: Sono Lillo
overview: Who is Posaman? A superhero, of course! And what is the super power of him? Knowing how to make cover poses. But who is hiding behind the costume? Wellâ€¦ there is Lillo! Success, as we know, has its negative implications and for Lillo the time has come to choose between fame and private life, because his wife really doesn't seem to bear it anymore.
